ctFastPathDynamicArpInspectionMIB.name: ctFastPathDynamicArpInspectionMIB
ctFastPathDynamicArpInspectionMIB.contactinfo: Postal: Enterasys Networks 50 Minuteman Rd. Andover, MA 01810-1008 USA Phone: +1 978 684 1000 E-mail: support@enterasys.com WWW: http://www.enterasys.com
ctFastPathDynamicArpInspectionMIB.description: The Enterasys MIB for FASTPATH Dynamic ARP INspection

ctAgentDaiSrcMacValidate.name: ctAgentDaiSrcMacValidate
ctAgentDaiSrcMacValidate.description: This object indicates whether Sender MAC validation in the ARP packets is enabled. If this object is set to 'true', validation is enabled. If this object is set to 'false', validation is disabled.

ctAgentDaiDstMacValidate.name: ctAgentDaiDstMacValidate
ctAgentDaiDstMacValidate.description: This object indicates whether Target MAC validation in the ARP Response packets is enabled. If this object is set to 'true', validation is enabled. If this object is set to 'false', validation is disabled.

ctAgentDaiIPValidate.name: ctAgentDaiIPValidate
ctAgentDaiIPValidate.description: This object indicates whether IP address validation in the ARP packets is enabled. If this object is set to 'true', validation is enabled. If this object is set to 'false', validation is disabled.

ctAgentDaiVlanConfigTable.name: ctAgentDaiVlanConfigTable
ctAgentDaiVlanConfigTable.description: A table provides the mechanism to control Dynamic ARP Inspection per VLAN. When a VLAN is created in a device supporting this table, a corresponding entry of this table will be added.

ctAgentDaiVlanConfigEntry.name: ctAgentDaiVlanConfigEntry
ctAgentDaiVlanConfigEntry.description: A row instance contains the configuration for Dynamic ARP Inspection at each existing VLAN.

ctAgentDaiVlanIndex.name: ctAgentDaiVlanIndex
ctAgentDaiVlanIndex.description: This object indicates the VLAN number on which Dynamic ARP Inspection feature is configured.

ctAgentDaiVlanDynArpInspEnable.name: ctAgentDaiVlanDynArpInspEnable
ctAgentDaiVlanDynArpInspEnable.description: This object indicates whether Dynamic ARP Inspection is enabled in this VLAN. If this object is set to 'true', Dynamic ARP Inspection is enabled. If this object is set to 'false', Dynamic ARP Inspection is disabled.

ctAgentDaiVlanLoggingEnable.name: ctAgentDaiVlanLoggingEnable
ctAgentDaiVlanLoggingEnable.description: This object indicates whether the Dynamic ARP Inspection logging is enabled on this VlAN. If this object is set to 'true', Dynamic ARP Inspection logging is enabled. If this object is set to 'false', Dynamic ARP Inspection loging is disabled.

ctAgentDaiVlanArpAclName.name: ctAgentDaiVlanArpAclName
ctAgentDaiVlanArpAclName.description: This object indicates the ARP ACL name set for this VLAN.

ctAgentDaiVlanArpAclStaticFlag.name: ctAgentDaiVlanArpAclStaticFlag
ctAgentDaiVlanArpAclStaticFlag.description: This object indicates whether the ARP ACL set for this VLAN has static flag set. If this object is set to 'true', static flag is enabled. If this object is set to 'false', static flag is disabled.

ctAagentDaiStatsReset.name: ctAagentDaiStatsReset
ctAagentDaiStatsReset.description: Clear the DAI statistics on all vlans. A value of reset(1) is used to reset the statistics. A read on this object will always return the value none(0). The value none(0) cannot be forcibly set by the administrator.

ctAgentDaiVlanStatsTable.name: ctAgentDaiVlanStatsTable
ctAgentDaiVlanStatsTable.description: A table provides the mechanism to control Dynamic ARP Inspection per VLAN. When a VLAN is created in a device supporting this table, a corresponding entry of this table will be added.

ctAgentDaiVlanStatsEntry.name: ctAgentDaiVlanStatsEntry
ctAgentDaiVlanStatsEntry.description: A row instance contains the Dynamic ARP Inspection statistics per VLAN.

ctAgentDaiVlanStatsIndex.name: ctAgentDaiVlanStatsIndex
ctAgentDaiVlanStatsIndex.description: This object indicates the VLAN number on which Dynamic ARP Inspection statistics are retrieved.

ctAgentDaiVlanPktsForwarded.name: ctAgentDaiVlanPktsForwarded
ctAgentDaiVlanPktsForwarded.description: Number of valid ARP packets forwarded by DAI.

ctAgentDaiVlanPktsDropped.name: ctAgentDaiVlanPktsDropped
ctAgentDaiVlanPktsDropped.description: Number of invalid ARP packets dropped by DAI.

ctAgentDaiVlanDhcpDrops.name: ctAgentDaiVlanDhcpDrops
ctAgentDaiVlanDhcpDrops.description: Number of ARP packets that were dropped by DAI as there is no matching DHCP Snooping binding entry found.

ctAgentDaiVlanDhcpPermits.name: ctAgentDaiVlanDhcpPermits
ctAgentDaiVlanDhcpPermits.description: Number of ARP packets that were forwarded by DAI as there is a matching DHCP Snooping binding entry found.

ctAgentDaiVlanAclDrops.name: ctAgentDaiVlanAclDrops
ctAgentDaiVlanAclDrops.description: Number of ARP packets that were dropped by DAI as there is no matching ARP ACL rule found for this Vlan and the static flag is set on this vlan.

ctAgentDaiVlanAclPermits.name: ctAgentDaiVlanAclPermits
ctAgentDaiVlanAclPermits.description: Number of ARP packets that were permitted by DAI as there is a matching ARP ACL rule found for this Vlan.

ctAgentDaiVlanSrcMacFailures.name: ctAgentDaiVlanSrcMacFailures
ctAgentDaiVlanSrcMacFailures.description: Number of ARP packets that were dropped by DAI as the sender mac address in ARP packet didn't match the source mac in ethernet header.

ctAgentDaiVlanDstMacFailures.name: ctAgentDaiVlanDstMacFailures
ctAgentDaiVlanDstMacFailures.description: Number of ARP packets that were dropped by DAI as the target mac address in ARP reply packet didn't match the destination mac in ethernet header.

ctAgentDaiVlanIpValidFailures.name: ctAgentDaiVlanIpValidFailures
ctAgentDaiVlanIpValidFailures.description: Number of ARP packets that were dropped by DAI as the sender IP address in ARP packet or target IP address in ARP reply packet is invalid. Invalid addresses include 0.0.0.0, 255.255.255.255, IP multicast addresses, class E addresses (240.0.0.0/4), loopback addresses (127.0.0.0/8).

ctAgentDaiIfConfigTable.name: ctAgentDaiIfConfigTable
ctAgentDaiIfConfigTable.description: A table provides the mechanism to configure the trust state for Dynamic ARP Inspection purpose at each physical interface capable of this feature.

ctAgentDaiIfConfigEntry.name: ctAgentDaiIfConfigEntry
ctAgentDaiIfConfigEntry.description: A row instance contains the configuration for Dynamic ARP Inspection at each physical interface capable of this feature.

ctAgentDaiIfTrustEnable.name: ctAgentDaiIfTrustEnable
ctAgentDaiIfTrustEnable.description: This object indicates whether the interface is trusted for Dynamic ARP Inspection purpose. If this object is set to 'true', the interface is trusted. ARP packets coming to this interface will be forwarded without checking. If this object is set to 'false', the interface is not trusted. ARP packets coming to this interface will be subjected to ARP inspection.

ctAgentDaiIfRateLimit.name: ctAgentDaiIfRateLimit
ctAgentDaiIfRateLimit.description: This object indicates rate limit value for Dynamic ARP Inspection purpose. If the incoming rate of ARP packets exceeds the value of this object for consecutively burst interval seconds, ARP packets will be dropped.

ctAgentDaiIfBurstInterval.name: ctAgentDaiIfBurstInterval
ctAgentDaiIfBurstInterval.description: This object indicates the burst interval value for rate limiting purpose on this interface.
